faq.question: What's the best free editing software?
faq.answer: DaVinci Resolve is the most powerful free option with professional features. CapCut is easier for beginners. Both are genuinely free, not trials.

faq.question: How long should editing take?
faq.answer: Expect 2-4 hours of editing per finished minute when starting out. With practice and templates, this drops to 1-2 hours or less.

faq.question: Should I edit my own videos?
faq.answer: Start by editing yourself to learn the craft and your style. As you grow, outsourcing editing frees time for more content and strategy.

faq.question: What export settings should I use?
faq.answer: 1080p at 30fps or 4K at 24-60fps. H.264 codec. High bitrate (15+ Mbps for 1080p, 35+ for 4K). YouTube re-compresses, so start with quality.
